system.requirement: While it is your companion, the Kraken cannot be harmed.

abilities.description: When you summon the Kraken, fill one segment of a four-segment clock. The Kraken will heed a single command to destroy or overcome any foe or obstacle. If you are in a fight, @Compendium[foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.3129f4caa4754caf]{Take Decisive Action} with an automatic strong hit. When the clock is filled, @Compendium[foundry-ironsworn.starforgedoracles.9f68aab75fcbbba9]{Ask the Oracle} (using the yes/no table) if the Kraken turns against you, making it 50/50. On a yes, discard this asset; the Kraken is now an epic foe. On a no, clear one segment of the clock.
When you make a move using a threat to call the Kraken as leverage, add +2.

One time only, when you @Compendium[foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.985a5415860a99e9]{Fulfill Your Vow} (formidable or greater) in service to the Kraken and score a hit, choose one: clear all clock segments, or discard this asset and mark three boxes on your bonds legacy track.
